name: KRYP
description:
ONE BUTTON LOCAL MULTIPLAYER SHOOTER VIDEO GAME ENTERTAINMENT


PRESS YOUR BUTTON TO JUMP

PRESS IT AGAIN TO SHOOT

AMAZINGLY SIMPLE GAMEPLAY

PLAY WITH ANY BUTTON!

THE KEYS ON YOUR KEYBOARD?
ALL THE GAMEPADS?
YOUR DRAWING TABLET?

I DON'T CARE!
PLAY WITH ALL OF IT!

INCREDIBLY REALISTIC SOUND EFFECTS!
ALL MADE WITH A MOUTH! YOU WON'T BELIEVE YOUR EARS!

ps. no music
